subject: RE: 148974 - [Type 2] Broker 3 vs. CGML : Margin Notice, Portfolio Statement
content:
Partially agree

Broker 3 pay 640k gbp for VD 23/6/18

-----Original Message-----
From: XXXXXXX.XXXXX@XXXX.XXX <XXXXXXX.XXXXX@XXXX.XXX >

Subject: 148974 - [Type 2] Broker 3 vs. CGML : Margin Notice, Portfolio Statement

Good Morning,

Please see attached today's margin call

In the event of a dispute please revert with your MTM / IA and collateral balance and if you are not in tri resolve your portfolio in excel format.

Thanks and Regards,

XXXXXXX.XXXXX@XXXX.XXX

 

Group Line: +11-11-11111-1111

Group Email: XXXXXXX.XXXXX@XXXX.XXX
